item.description:
Open to all climbers! All ages and abilities welcome.

Registration: 11a-12p
Comp:12p-4p
Awards and After Party to follow.

Competition Format: MIXED, REDPOINT
Competitors will have both boulder problems and top rope routes to choose from. The redpoint format allows competetors multiple attempts on each route. Points are awarded for completion. Final score will be the sum of your five best scores.

Categories for youth, adult, and masters will be scored.

For more information about the competition, visit:
http://ctrockgym.com/...

For more information about USA Climbing's Collegiate Series, visit:
http://usaclimbing.ne...

Any additional questions, email nate[at]ctrockgym[dot]com or call 203.404.5166
item.name: CT Boulder Brawl // USA Climbing's CCS Competition
